title: Crayfish for Julie
brief_description: Depicts a day in the life of a fisherman catching crayfish off the coast near Fremantle, Western Australia. Briefly traces the growth and development of the crayfish industry. Made with the co operation of the Department of Fisheries Western Australia. Narrated by Clive Winmill.
